EmailTemplate.description: Thank you for registering to attend the PDS in Boston, MA
EmailTemplate.name: Partnership Dialogue Series - Boston, Thank you for registering
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation to attend ASA's Partnership Dialogue Series!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for registering to attend ASAâ€™s Partnership Dialogue Series: A Focus on Consolidation.
Date: Wednesday, February 28, 2007 Start Time: 8:30 am Location:
American Student Assistance 100 Cambridge Street Boston, MA 02114
Canceling Your Registration If you need to cancel or change your registration please email Nancy Meehan at nmeehan@amsa.com or call 1-800-999-9080, ext. 4207.
In Case of Bad Weather In case of delay or cancellation due to inclement weather, an update will be available on the training line at 1-800-999-9080, ext. 3099 by 6:30am on the day of the session.
We look forward to seeing you!
